commands.name: foxxo
commands.description: Get a random picture & trivia of a cute fox!

commands.name: notfoxxo
commands.description: Get a random picture & trivia of a cute... not a fox!

commands.name: foxxo-on-a-timer
commands.description: Runs the /foxxo command on an interval.

options.name: channel
options.description: (OPTIONAL) Uses the current channel if not specified.

commands.name: notfoxxo-on-a-timer
commands.description: Runs the /notfoxxo command on an interval.

options.name: channel
options.description: Uses the current channel if not specified.
